page.title: 09Harraton Primary School.
page.content: {Vikki Minto writes:- Our school is a single storey building.We have a hall with a wooden floor and small windows near the ceiling.There are seven classes,three infant and four junior,all have tiled floors.In the Junior department we have two art and two quiet areas:one of each for J1/2 and one of each for J3/4.All the rooms have two big windows with blinds to keep out the sun.We get extra light from two skylights.We have two fire doors and all rooms have a fire alarm.We sit at tables and have drawers in a trolley for our books and pens.There are twenty three children in my class - Junior 3.{Our school is nine years {old. It is open plan.
